about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. I love creating beautiful, user-friendly interfaces and robust backend systems.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills in full-stack development and modern web technologies.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution built with Rails API and React frontend. Features include user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

task.title: Task Management App
task.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates. Built with TypeScript and featuring drag-and-drop functionality.

dashboard.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
dashboard.description: Interactive dashboard for data visualization with charts, filters, and real-time data updates. Optimized for performance and user experience.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: Personal portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Fully responsive and SEO optimized.

chat.title: Chat Application
chat.description: Real-time chat application with private rooms and emoji support. Built using React and Firebase.

blog.title: Blog Platform
blog.description: Multi-user blog platform with markdown support and comments. Built with Django and React.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey in software development, building amazing products and growing as a developer.

senior.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
senior.description: Lead development of scalable web applications using Ruby on Rails and React. Mentor junior developers and architect system solutions.
achievements: Reduced application load time by 40% through optimization
Led team of 5 developers on major product redesign
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%

fullstack.title: Full-Stack Developer
fullstack.description: Developed and maintained multiple client applications using modern web technologies. Collaborated with design and product teams.
achievements: Integrated payment systems and third-party APIs

junior.title: Junior Developer
junior.description: Started career building responsive websites and learning full-stack development. Gained experience in agile methodologies.
achievements: Learned React, Node.js, and modern development practices

intern.title: Intern Developer
intern.description: Assisted in developing internal tools and automation scripts. Participated in code reviews and team meetings.
achievements: Automated data entry tasks saving 10+ hours/week

freelance.title: Freelance Web Developer
freelance.description: Worked with small businesses to create and maintain their web presence. Delivered custom solutions based on client needs.
achievements: Provided ongoing support and SEO optimization

ta.title: Teaching Assistant
ta.description: Supported students in introductory programming courses. Helped design assignments and grade projects.

blog.title: Latest Blog Posts
blog.subtitle: Thoughts on web development, tutorials, and insights from my experience building modern applications.

rails.title: Building Scalable Rails APIs
rails.excerpt: Best practices for creating robust and scalable API endpoints with Ruby on Rails, including authentication, serialization, and performance optimization.

react19.title: React 19 New Features Deep Dive
react19.excerpt: Exploring the latest features in React 19, including the new compiler, concurrent features, and how they improve developer experience.

ts.title: TypeScript Tips for Better Code
ts.excerpt: Advanced TypeScript techniques that will make your code more type-safe, maintainable, and enjoyable to work with.

reactperf.title: Optimizing React Performance
reactperf.excerpt: How to profile and optimize React apps for speed, including memoization, lazy loading, and avoiding unnecessary renders.

docker.title: Deploying with Docker and GitHub Actions
docker.excerpt: A step-by-step guide to containerizing your app and setting up CI/CD pipelines using Docker and GitHub Actions.

accessibility.title: Accessible Web Design Essentials
accessibility.excerpt: Key principles and tools for making your web applications accessible to everyone, including ARIA roles and keyboard navigation.
